title: Fullstack Web Developer - Alfredo Dumaine
description: Fullstack Web Developer from Mexico City, Mexico. Expert in Symfony, React, Node.js, JavaScript ES6+, and RESTful APIs.

hero.title: Hello I'm Alfredo Dumaine!
hero.job_title: Fullstack Web Developer from Mexico City, Mexico.
hero.description: Specialist in PHP, Symfony, React, Node.js, Express.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind. Expert in RESTful API development and passionate about creating efficient and scalable solutions.

jobs_description.title: Fullstack Web Developer
jobs_description.description: Designed software and hardware updates for electronic voting machines, implemented security measures to protect sensitive data, and planned comprehensive hardware and software testing. Coordinated the implementation of electronic voting exercises, ensuring system quality and reliability.
list: Design of software and hardware updates for electronic voting machines
Planning and execution of hardware and software testing

jobs_description.title: Web Developer
jobs_description.description: Proposed and designed software and hardware updates for specific systems, implemented security systems to protect data, and planned hardware and software testing. Prepared detailed reports on developments and designed control and maintenance mechanisms.
list: Design of software and hardware updates
Implementation of data management security systems
Planning and execution of system testing

jobs_description.title: Systems Assistant
jobs_description.description: Performed preventive and corrective maintenance of computer equipment, ensuring optimal operation. Collaborated in the development and support of internal web tools to optimize processes. Documented technical procedures and applied solutions, contributing to the continuous improvement of the IT area.
list: Development and support of web tools using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Documentation of technical procedures and results

projects.title: Electronic Voting Platform
projects.description: First platform in Mexico for comprehensive management of citizen participation exercises. An innovative system that allows graphical design of electronic voting booth interfaces, management of multiple simultaneous exercises, and real-time results visualization. Implemented nationwide, this solution has revolutionized how electronic voting processes are administered across Mexico.

projects.title: OPL Table Validator
projects.description: Specialized software for Local Public Organizations (OPL) that automates integrity validation of electoral information tables. It verifies structure, content, and performs modification analysis, generating detailed reports to ensure data quality before submission to INE. A fundamental tool in the electoral process, successfully implemented throughout Mexico.

projects.title: Business Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard designed for efficient business management. Offers dynamic visualizations of KPIs, financial metrics, and real-time trend analysis. This tool facilitates strategic decision-making by providing a comprehensive view of business performance through intuitive and customizable interfaces.

contributions.title: Advanced Periodontics

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Passionate about technology and web development.
about.description: I'm a Fullstack Web Developer with experience in frontend and backend, specialized in creating innovative solutions using technologies like Symfony, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. With expertise in RESTful APIs, Docker, and database design, I enjoy continuous learning and improving my skills to deliver high-quality products. My goal is to build projects that create positive impact and provide exceptional user experiences.

contact.title: Ready to make your dreams come true?
